Bulk creation of generic sub-tasks in Jira. Tired of creating the same common sub-tasks for your Jira stories? Now you can bulk create ðŸ’ªðŸ˜Ž

Usage:
1. Go to the settings page and enter your company jira URL, user and password.
2. Create a list of the sub-tasks you want to create.
3. Enable/disable the sub-tasks required sub-tasks in the checkbox.
4. Browse to the task, you want to create the sub-tasks for.
5. Press GO! The sub-tasks will be created with the description "Auto-generated" 

Versions:
1.2.0: Better error handling and password hiding
1.1.0: Options for selecting project and sub-project type
1.0.1: First version
